title: Can someone explain what is going on with this Optus service issue? Its been nearly 24hours
body: "Players on Optus connections may experience intermittent issues connecting to games. These players are advised to avoid playing ranked until this issue is resolved" Are riot even doing anything about this matter. Im honestly about to change internet providers.

replies.body:
Tried playing two games, both times games refuses to load and just gets stuck on the logo and black screen. 
Wtf riot?
Amazing now I get punished for this with lower priority. Just what I wanted.

> [{quoted}](name=cheekibreekilad,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=YsepTq1G,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-05-05T10:01:55.445+0000)
>
> Tried playing two games, both times games refuses to load and just gets stuck on the logo and black screen. 
> Wtf riot?
> Amazing now I get punished for this with lower priority. Just what I wanted.

Same.. ontop of that got flamed in the endgame lobby =w= Sense made
It worst when u reconnect, then play for 40 minutes BUT your rewards are forfeited  EVEN THOUGH  u played and helped your team win

If you read the NSW QLD News and not live under a rock, your complaint wouldn't need to be posted.
anyways a NBN cable was destroyed by so called several lightning strikes in one location and since the 01/05/2018 the internet has been affected locally and state wide. if you have any issues still report them to Tesltra.
This is an Optus service issue, not a Telstra nor NBN one.
Yeah 3 games for me now . :/ wonâ€™t connect
I'd also be interested in an update on this issue.  ^-^"
So mindstar replied to me 15 minutes ago saying that has been no update so far except what they said
They are also stilling waiting for a reply

For the record, this thread would belong in either Miscellaneous or Help and Support, not Team Recruitment, but the full update can be found here:
https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/ElA0rvVL/d/bfiHA3TY

I also Agree with you Seras Dragon, This should be re posted Under Help or Miscellaneous.
* and the NBN Cable could most likely be the reason as this is the same for me. your Download speed is normal or unnoticed but the problem is your upload. no upload no connection to Riot Games. simply that easy to understand. you can sit for 10mins trying to connect to league and eventually connect or get a re connection message for 10mins. what you do with your time is in your hands.
feel free to correct me but im just stating the facts that i have received from Telstra and 9News. again correct me if i'm wrong
